title: Lea Michele shows off glossy locks as she leaves Hollywood salon in distressed sweater and jeans
text:
She found fame on TV show Glee and went on to star in the TV series Scream Queens.

And in 10 days, Lea Michele will release an album of seasonal songs called Christmas In The City.

On Tuesday, the actress and singer, 33, was snapped leaving a hair salon in West Hollywood after a pampering session.

Long glossy locks: Former Glee star Lea Michele, 33, was snapped leaving a hair salon in West Hollywood after a pampering session on Tuesday

Lea's long locks looked glossy and voluminous after getting some professional attention.

She stepped out in a distressed white sweater and blue jeans rolled up at the bottoms.

She wore slippers and carried a large mustard-colored leather tote.

Casually stylish: She stepped out in a distressed white sweater and blue jeans rolled up at the bottoms. She wore slippers and carried a large mustard-colored leather tote

Moving on: The actress and singer recently listed her West LA home for $3.15 million. She purchased the four-bedroom, four-bath residence with swimming pool in 2015

The brunette recently put her LA home on the market for $3.15 million.

The four-bedroom, four-bath residence is located in the exclusive Mandeville Canyon neighborhood in the West LA community of Brentwood.

The property situated on half an acre has a swimming pool and stunning canyon views.

Lea purchased the property in 2015 for just under $3 million.

The listing comes seven months after the actress tied the knot with businessman Zandy Reich, 36.

The couple tied the knot after two years of dating.
description: In 10 days, the former Glee star will release an album of seasonal songs called Christmas In The City.
